resources.string: Password must be more than 6 characters
Buy now to enjoy the rest of the story.
You can purchase comic after logged in
Check your mail and login after verify email address

Pon-chan is a freelance writer based in Japan. She has worked with children and young adults while volunteering in Africa.

 When she's not writing, you can find her grading papers or teaching at a local university.

 Her recently released comic, Johnny Xtreme, is based on sweet fun and action-packing characters who are loyal and fearless. The characters unite people through the love of sports.

 For more information, and to get your Johnny Xtreme merchandise, please visit https://xtremeteez.com

Mushy is a freelance writer and teacher based in Japan. He teaches children and young adults.

 In his childhood he was a comic book junkie. He read everything Marvel, DC, and Archie.

 His writings advocate for hard work and respect. Over the years as an educator he has imparted these values to his students.

 When he’s not writing, he enjoys reading and exercising.

 For more information, and to get your Johnny Xtreme merchandise, please visit https://xtremeteez.com
